title: Manohari Kundan Kadas - Emerald Elegance
features: Classic Kadas design featuring a symmetrical arrangement of oval-cut emeralds and surrounding Kundan settings, meticulously handcrafted. The Kundan work exhibits intricate detailing showcasing the art of setting uncut diamonds in gold. The open setting allows light to pass through and maximize the gemstone's brilliance. The ends of the kadas are designed with delicate geometric detailing.
colors: Predominantly gold with vibrant green emeralds and the subtle sparkle of Kundan.
occasions: and special occasions like a Seemantham or Half-Saree function. Also suitable for adding a touch of traditional elegance to contemporary outfits.
description: These Kadas seamlessly blend traditional South Indian craftsmanship with contemporary design sensibilities. The use of high-quality emeralds and meticulous Kundan work ensures a timeless piece of heirloom jewelry. The Hyderabadi polish provides exceptional durability and a lasting shine. An exquisite investment piece that can be passed down through generations.
